details.incident_description: Ghar mein chori aur sona-paisa chori ho gaya.

story: Last week, I received threatening Emails online.
Last night, my child went missing from park.
Raat ko mere ghar ke bahar se laptop chori ho gaya.

table.Incident Description: Ghar ke bahar se laptop chori ho gaya.

story: Kal ek safed gaadi ne mere scooter ko takkar mari aur driver bhaag gaya.

table.Incident Description: Safed gaadi ne scooter ko takkar mari, driver bhaag gaya.

story: Mujhe ek anjaane number se dhamki bhari calls aa rahi hain.

story: Last night around 11 PM, while we were sleeping, someone broke into our house. They entered through the kitchen window, which was left slightly open. They stole jewelry worth over 2 lakh rupees, including gold necklaces, rings, and bracelets. They also took cash from the drawer in the living room. We heard some noise around midnight but thought it was the cat. This morning, we found the window open and the jewelry box empty. Our neighbor mentioned seeing a suspicious man lurking around our house the previous evening.

table.Incident Description: Burglary through the kitchen window with jewelry and cash stolen.

story: Yesterday evening at 6 PM, I was riding my bike back home from work. At the intersection near the shopping mall, a speeding car jumped the red light and crashed into my bike from the side. I fell on the road and injured my leg and arm. The driver did not stop and sped away. The car was a white sedan with tinted windows. Some pedestrians helped me get up and called an ambulance. The police were informed, and I was taken to the hospital. I remember one of the bystanders noting down the car's number plate.

table.Incident Description: Speeding car jumped the red light and hit the bike, causing injuries.

story: For the past week, I have been receiving threatening calls from an unknown number. The caller threatens me with harm if I don't pay a certain amount of money. The voice sounds like a middle-aged man, and he calls at odd hours, including late at night. He also sent me text messages with abusive language. I have saved all the messages and recorded some of the calls for evidence. The calls are causing me anxiety and affecting my sleep. I believe this person is targeting me intentionally.

table.Incident Description: Receiving threatening calls and abusive text messages from an unknown number.
table.Additional Notes: Messages saved and calls recorded as evidence.

story: My daughter has been missing since last night. She went to her friend's house for a group study session but did not return home. Her friend's parents mentioned that she left their house around 8 PM. She was last seen walking towards the main road near the park. She was wearing a pink top and blue jeans. We searched all nearby places, including the park, market, and bus stop, but there was no sign of her. She did not take her mobile phone with her, so we couldn't contact her. We are extremely worried as this is very unusual behavior for her.

table.Incident Description: Child went missing after leaving friend's house.
table.Location: Near the park on the main road
table.Additional Notes: Last seen wearing pink top and blue jeans.
